#FDA revoked #EmergencyUseAuthorization for #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine ! Found unlikely to be effective in treating COVID-19 for EUA designated uses and that known and potential risks outweigh benefits. https://t.co/saLKJ8O2nP
